name: Mystical Mixing
description:
Did you ever dream to do MAGIC?

Show your skills in this wizard game full of mystery where you craft magic pets, do your magic tricks, use some alchemy and become the most powerful wizard in the universe.

The whole game is all about DIY magic tricks

Make some potions and spells.
> Love potion
> Happy potion
> Rainbow magic
> Become invisible
> Full Body-Bind curse

In Mystical mixing you have a ton of different cauldrons where you craft your magic pets. Use the pot to add mystery ingredients, stir it, tap it with the wand and boom! You have a new magic pets.

Mystical mixing is one of those games where you put your imagination in real life.

Become the best witch or wizard in the mystical forest where you can clawee your magic pets to discover new spells, build your village, find the hidden gems, portals, new magical creatures and so much more.

Use the portal to go to the frozen forest where things are becoming even more mystical.

Use the spell book to see the recipes for creating DIY magic pets. There are more than 300 magic pets. All unique with their own abilities.

They can fly, sing, cry, laugh, build, protect. They will become best friends with the witch or wizard or become their nemesis.

You can also merge the creatures to make them to be even more magical and beautiful.

TAP! TAP!

Upgrade the pot, stir with the magic wand, add spells, craft the magic in unique DIY game.

Download MYSTICAL MIXING now and enter the magical universe.
